alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 4:53PM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Total accumulations of 4 to 8 inches along South Pass. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind could create difficult travel conditions, including along Highway 28 over South Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall late this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
